COVID-19 Support
For Schools

Monitor the well-being of students and staff. Get the social support they need. Guidance from top physicians to support your school's operations.

Schedule a Meeting
POWERED BY

AND EXPERTISE AT

Protect What Matters Most

  • Expert Advising Consult with top physicians and educators to walk through any challenge.
  • Community and Social Support We're not just another survey app. We connect your families to triage and social services with a tap.
  • Simple Screening Parents fill out fast, daily surveys so you and our expert staff can monitor your school and prevent closures.

How does Greenlight work?

  • Parents Greenlight Students

    Every morning parents submit a quick survey with their children's symptoms.

  • Connect with Care

    We connect symptomatic students and staff to testing and care services. In partnership with local nonprofits, we also help to empower a community of parents to help each other in times of need.

  • Recover

    Along with guiding the students recovery, we share our data with the local health department so they can improve their tracing efforts to keep everyone safe.

Proven at Scale

Greenlight evolved from Duke Health's Pandemic Response Network which launched across 40 states, 5 countries, and 2 languages. Our monitoring will give you and our experts the insight needed to make the decisions that will keep school in session throughout the year.

These same protocols have been used to keep Duke University and Duke Hospital operating throughout the pandemic.

Schedule a Meeting

Clinical and Scientific Advistory Team

Our Partners

Greenlight is proud to work with the following organizations.

Curamericas has provided grants to schools throughout North Carolina to use Greenlight fo free. Additionally, Curamericas has provided community health workers who handle social service requests for Greenlight families ranging from food assistance to income relief.

Along with partner with Duke Health's top physicians for population health and infectious diseases, Greenlight has partnered with Duke to provide free testing to the Durham community. Duke is also processing COVID-19 relief payments for those who need to quarantine.

Through >Supply Hawk, Greenlight provides low cost access to personal protective equipment for both school staff and family.

Stop the Spread has brought together a community of executives, volunteers, donors, and subject matter experts to catalyze action and augment government in response to COVID-19.
